title: WTB: T206 Doc White Portrait GOT IT!

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Doc White Portrait GOT IT!
posts.post_content: Does anyone have a T206 Doc White Portrait for sale? SGC 50-70, PSA 4-6. Any back ok. No creases, decent centering. Please send price and scan to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]

I Have one SGC 60, email sent


[url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url]
